code: import React from'react';import'./Modal.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Modal=_ref=>{let{isOpen,onClose,title,message,type='info',confirmText='OK'}=_ref;if(!isOpen)return null;const handleOverlayClick=e=>{if(e.target===e.currentTarget){onClose();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay",onClick:handleOverlayClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-icon ".concat(type),children:[type==='success'&&'✓',type==='error'&&'✗',type==='info'&&'ℹ',type==='warning'&&'⚠']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"modal-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"modal-message",children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-buttons",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"modal-btn modal-btn-primary",onClick:onClose,children:confirmText})})]})});};export default Modal;
